prayers.name: Arise, O Lord...
prayers.text: Arise, O Lord, and let Thy enemies be scattered, and let all who hate Thee flee before Thy Face!

prayers.name: Arise, O Lord...
prayers.text: Surge Domine et dissipentur inimici Tui et fugiant qui oderunt Te a Facie Tua.

prayers.name: O God, our Protector...
prayers.text: O God, our Protector, look down upon us and cast Thine eyes upon the Face of Thy Christ!

prayers.name: O God, our Protector...
prayers.text: Protector noster, aspice, Deus, et respice in Faciem Christi Tui.
